original_text: Abishai the brother of Joab son of Zeruiah was chief of the Three. He raised his spear against three hundred men, whom he killed, and so he became as famous as the Three.
korean_text: 또 스루야의 아들 요압의 아우 아비새이니 그는 그 세 사람의 우두머리라 그가 그의 창을 들어 삼백 명을 죽이고 세 사람 중에 이름을 얻었으니

sentences.original_text: He raised his spear against three hundred men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 삼백 명의 남자를 향해 창을 들었다

sentences.original_text: and so he became as famous as the Three
